Class Bishop

  • java.lang.Object
    • Bishop
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Piece

    public class Bishop
extends java.lang.Object
implements Piece
    The Bishop class is used to check the validation of movement for Bishop like pieces
    Author:
    Nicholas Joerger, Tim Chisholm, Shane Rand, Hassan Robinson
